verses.verse: תְּפִלָּ֗ה <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-Lah, A Prayer לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-Da-Vid of David שִׁמְעָ֤ה <S%H8085><s%> shim-'Ah Hear יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD צֶ֗דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek, the right הַקְשִׁ֥יבָה <S%H7181><s%> hak-Shi-vah attend רִנָּתִ֗י <S%H7440><s%> rin-na-Ti, unto my cry הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <S%H238><s%> ha-'a-Zi-nah give ear תְפִלָּתִ֑י <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-la-Ti; unto my prayer בְּ֝לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> be-Lo, [that goeth] not שִׂפְתֵ֥י <S%H8193><s%> sif-Tei lips מִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> mir-Mah. out of feigned

מִ֭לְּפָנֶיךָ <S%H6440><s%> Mil-le-fa-nei-cha from thy presence מִשְׁפָּטִ֣י <S%H4941><s%> mish-pa-Ti Let my sentence יֵצֵ֑א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze; come forth עֵ֝ינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-cha, let thine eyes תֶּחֱזֶ֥ינָה <S%H2372><s%> te-che-Zei-nah behold מֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <S%H4339><s%> mei-sha-Rim. the things that are equal

בָּ֘חַ֤נְתָּ <S%H974><s%> ba-Chan-ta Thou hast proved לִבִּ֨י׀ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi mine heart פָּ֘קַ֤דְתָּ <S%H6485><s%> pa-Kad-ta thou hast visited לַּ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> Lay-lah, [me] in the night צְרַפְתַּ֥נִי <S%H6884><s%> tze-raf-Ta-ni thou hast tried בַל־ <S%H1077><s%> val- nothing תִּמְצָ֑א <S%H4672><s%> tim-Tza; me [and] shalt find זַ֝מֹּתִ֗י <S%H2161><s%> zam-mo-Ti, nothing I am purposed בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- nothing יַעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> ya-'a-vor- shall not transgress פִּֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> Pi. [that] my mouth

לִפְעֻלּ֣וֹת <S%H6468><s%> lif-'ul-Lot Concerning the works אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> 'A-dom of men בִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> bid-Var by the word שְׂפָתֶ֑יךָ <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-Tei-cha; of thy lips אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I שָׁ֝מַ֗רְתִּי <S%H8104><s%> Mar-ti, I have kept אָרְח֥וֹת <S%H734><s%> a-re-Chot [me from] the paths פָּרִֽיץ׃ <S%H6530><s%> pa-Ritz. of the destroyer

תָּמֹ֣ךְ <S%H8551><s%> ta-Moch Hold up אֲ֭שֻׁרַי <S%H838><s%> 'A-shu-rai my goings בְּמַעְגְּלוֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H4570><s%> be-ma'-ge-lo-Tei-cha; in thy paths בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- have not נָמ֥וֹטּוּ <S%H4131><s%> na-Mot-tu slip פְעָמָֽי׃ <S%H6471><s%> fe-'a-Mai. [that] my footsteps

אֲנִֽי־ <S%H589><s%> 'a-ni- I קְרָאתִ֣יךָ <S%H7121><s%> ke-ra-Ti-cha I have called כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> chi- for תַעֲנֵ֣נִי <S%H6030><s%> ta-'a-Ne-ni upon thee for thou wilt hear אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> 'El; me O God הַֽט־ <S%H5186><s%> hat- incline אָזְנְךָ֥ <S%H241><s%> 'a-ze-ne-Cha thine ear לִ֝֗י Li, שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma' unto me [and hear אִמְרָתִֽי׃ <S%H565><s%> 'im-ra-Ti. ] my speech

הַפְלֵ֣ה <S%H6395><s%> haf-Leh Shew thy marvellous חֲ֭סָדֶיךָ <S%H2617><s%> Cha-sa-dei-cha lovingkindness מוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <S%H3467><s%> mo-Shi-a' O thou that savest חוֹסִ֑ים <S%H2620><s%> cho-Sim; them which put their trust מִ֝מִּתְקוֹמְמִ֗ים <S%H6965><s%> mi-mit-kom-Mim, [in thee] from those that rise up בִּֽימִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> Bi-mi-Ne-cha. by thy right hand

שָׁ֭מְרֵנִי <S%H8104><s%> me-re-ni Keep כְּאִישׁ֣וֹן <S%H380><s%> ke-'i-Shon me as the apple בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- first עָ֑יִן <S%H5869><s%> 'A-yin; of the eye בְּצֵ֥ל <S%H6738><s%> be-Tzel me under the shadow כְּ֝נָפֶ֗יךָ <S%H3671><s%> ke-na-Fei-cha, of thy wings תַּסְתִּירֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5641><s%> tas-ti-Re-ni. hide

מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei From רְ֭שָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> Re-sha-'im the wicked ז֣וּ <S%H2098><s%> zu that שַׁדּ֑וּנִי <S%H7703><s%> shad-Du-ni; oppress אֹיְבַ֥י <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vai enemies בְּ֝נֶ֗פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> be-Ne-fesh, me [from] my deadly יַקִּ֥יפוּ <S%H5362><s%> yak-Ki-fu [who] compass me about עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai. and

חֶלְבָּ֥מוֹ <S%H2459><s%> chel-Ba-mov in their own fat סָּגְר֑וּ <S%H5462><s%> sa-ge-Ru; They are inclosed פִּ֝֗ימוֹ <S%H6310><s%> pi-mo, with their mouth דִּבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> dib-be-Ru they speak בְגֵאֽוּת׃ <S%H1348><s%> ve-ge-'Ut. proudly

אַ֭שֻּׁרֵינוּ <S%H838><s%> 'Ash-shu-rei-nu us in our steps עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah have now; סְבָבוּנִי se-va-vu-ni כסְבָב֑וּנוּ <S%H5437><s%> se-va-Vu-nu; make קעֵינֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Hem their eyes יָ֝שִׁ֗יתוּ <S%H7896><s%> ya-Shi-tu, they have set לִנְט֥וֹת <S%H5186><s%> lin-Tot bowing down בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. to the earth

דִּמְיֹנ֗וֹ <S%H1825><s%> dim-yo-No, Like כְּ֭אַרְיֵה <S%H738><s%> Ke-'ar-yeh as a lion יִכְס֣וֹף <S%H3700><s%> yich-Sof [that] is greedy לִטְר֑וֹף <S%H2963><s%> lit-Rof; of his prey וְ֝כִכְפִ֗יר <S%H3715><s%> ve-chich-Fir, and as it were a young lion יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev lurking בְּמִסְתָּרִֽים׃ <S%H4565><s%> be-mis-ta-Rim. in secret places

קוּמָ֤ה <S%H6965><s%> ku-Mah Arise יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD קַדְּמָ֣ה <S%H6923><s%> kad-de-Mah disappoint פָ֭נָיו <S%H6440><s%> Fa-nav him הַכְרִיעֵ֑הוּ <S%H3766><s%> hach-ri-'E-hu; cast him down פַּלְּטָ֥ה <S%H6403><s%> pal-le-Tah deliver נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi, my soul מֵרָשָׁ֥ע <S%H7563><s%> me-ra-Sha' from the wicked חַרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H2719><s%> char-Be-cha. [which is] thy sword

מִֽמְתִ֥ים <S%H4962><s%> mi-Tim From men יָדְךָ֨׀ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha [which are] thy hand יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD מִֽמְתִ֬ים <S%H4962><s%> mi-Tim from men מֵחֶ֗לֶד <S%H2465><s%> me-Che-led, of the world חֶלְקָ֥ם <S%H2506><s%> chel-Kam [which have] their portion בַּֽחַיִּים֮ <S%H2416><s%> ba-chai-Yim in [this] life; וּצְפִינְךָ u-tze-fi-ne-cha כוּֽצְפוּנְךָ֮ <S%H6840><s%> u-tze-fu-ne-Cha hid קתְּמַלֵּ֪א <S%H4390><s%> te-mal-Le thou fillest בִ֫טְנָ֥ם <S%H990><s%> vit-Nam and whose belly יִשְׂבְּע֥וּ <S%H7646><s%> yis-be-'U [treasure] they are full בָנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim; of children וְהִנִּ֥יחוּ <S%H3240><s%> ve-hin-Ni-chu and leave יִ֝תְרָ֗ם <S%H3499><s%> yit-Ram, the rest לְעוֹלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5768><s%> le-'ol-lei-Hem. of their [substance] to their babes

אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni, in בְּ֭צֶדֶק <S%H6664><s%> Be-tze-dek in righteousness אֶחֱזֶ֣ה <S%H2372><s%> 'e-che-Zeh As for me I will behold פָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nei-cha; thy face אֶשְׂבְּעָ֥ה <S%H7646><s%> 'es-be-'Ah I shall be satisfied בְ֝הָקִ֗יץ <S%H6974><s%> ve-ha-Kitz, when I awake תְּמוּנָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8544><s%> te-mu-na-Te-cha. with thy likeness
